resources.string:
The following clauses state that, Medimate shall not be held accountable if: A> The services provided are not taken without any advice of a medical professional B> If the user faces unforeseeable side effects of during their medication, that may/may not be hazardous C> If user shall provide incorrect medical data either due to medical negligence or any type of malpractice follows.
NOTE: Only upon agreeing to the terms and conditions, can a user register their donated medicines."
